name: Cube Conflict
description:
Immerse yourself in Cube Conflict, a free and open-source FPS where smileys wage war without mercy. Choose your side and equip yourself with powerful weapons as you face off against enemy forces in intense and chaotic battles.

  • Choose from a wide range of weapons. From simple swords and crossbows to futuristic lasers guns, and super weapons.
  • Choose from 15 classes, each with its unique abilities and skills.
  • Chase more than 10 powerful items to use in battle, including shields, boosts, and super-weapons.
  • Explore 5 unique and immersive environments, from the moon's low-gravity landscape to the fiery depths of a volcano.
  • 3 game modes, including deathmatch, capture the flag, and domination, each with its unique rules and challenges.
  • Compete against other players online, with official servers available 24/7.
  • Earn achievements and track your player stats as you compete against others online.
  • Customize your character with a wide range of skins, including capes, graves, and smileys.
  • 100% free, all skins are unlocked while playing!

Weapons you said?

Experience the power of advanced weapons, including the portable GAU-8, atomic bombs, and rocket miniguns.

Class system

Doctor, Soldier? For newbies. No doubt you would rather be a Kamikaze to blow yourself up and kill all the enemies around you or even a wizard to cast magic spells!

Useful(?) items

Even when death seems inevitable, you can turn the tide with the protection of power armor and the strength of powerful drugs.

Maps (for real!)

Incredible there are maps on this game! So, everyone knows rocket jump? Well, try it on the moon.

A lot of skins

Choose your character's appearance to look like a badass instead of an idiot, and leave a lasting impression with unique graves, including poop for the noobs and gold ingots for the wealthiest players.

Planned content

  • More maps!
  • Advanced tools for e-sport: Better server moderation and improved spectator experience.
  • Single-player campaign with a quest system in a semi-opened world.
